Interface DBAccess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DB

    public interface DBAccess

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long createRecord(java.lang.String[] data)
      Creates a new record in the database (possibly reusing a deleted entry).
      void deleteRecord(long recNo, long lockCookie)
      Deletes a record, making the record number and associated disk storage available for reuse.

      Find all records that match the specified criteria.

    • Method Detail

      • readRecord

        java.lang.String[] readRecord(long recNo)
                              throws RecordNotFoundException
        Reads a record from the file.
        Parameters:
        recNo - - The record number to be read.
        Returns:
        an array where each element is a record value.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException

      • updateRecord

        void updateRecord(long recNo,
                java.lang.String[] data,
                long lockCookie)
                  throws RecordNotFoundException,
                         SecurityException
        Modifies the fields of a record. Throws SecurityException if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.
        Parameters:
        recNo - - The record number to be updated.
        data - - The new value for field n appears in data[n]
        lockCookie - - The lock identification.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException
        SecurityException

      • deleteRecord

        void deleteRecord(long recNo,
                long lockCookie)
                  throws RecordNotFoundException,
                         SecurityException
        Deletes a record, making the record number and associated disk storage available for reuse. Throws SecurityException if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.
        Parameters:
        recNo - - The record number to be deleted.
        lockCookie - - The lock identification.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException
        SecurityException

      • findByCriteria

        long[] findByCriteria(java.lang.String[] criteria)
        Find all records that match the specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - - The target criteria to look for. Field n in the database file is described by criteria[n]. A null value in criteria[n] matches any field value. A non-null value in criteria[n] matches any field value that begins with criteria[n]. (For example, "Fred" matches "Fred" or "Freddy".)
        Returns:
        an array of record numbers that match the specified criteria.

      • createRecord

        long createRecord(java.lang.String[] data)
                  throws DuplicateKeyException
        Creates a new record in the database (possibly reusing a deleted entry).
        Parameters:
        data - - The new value for field n appears in data[n]
        Returns:
        the record number of the new record after insert the given data.
        Throws:
        DuplicateKeyException

      • lockRecord

        long lockRecord(long recNo)
                throws RecordNotFoundException
        Locks a record so that it can only be updated or deleted by this client. If the specified record is already locked by a different client, the current thread gives up the CPU and consumes no CPU cycles until the record is unlocked.
        Parameters:
        recNo - - The record number to be locked.
        Returns:
        the lock identification or cookie that must be used when the record is unlocked, updated, or deleted.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException

      • unlock

        void unlock(long recNo,
          long cookie)
            throws SecurityException
        Releases the lock on a record. Cookie
        Parameters:
        recNo - - The record number to be unlocked.
        lockCookie - - The cookie returned when the record was locked; otherwise throws SecurityException.
        Throws:
        SecurityException
